data.apiNameCn: 国际PNR验舱及验价（订单模式）
data.introduce:
国际可支付校验服务是在线分销平台上的一个自动化操作环节的重要服务，提供销售环节的服务功能。  
国际可支付校验服务(AirResValidateIntlOrder)提供的服务是：在航信在线分销平台上，根据客户请求，校验该订单以及PNR是否能进行支付的功能，主要校验PNR信息(旅客+航段)、价格信息。
data.business:
国际PNR信息（旅客+航段）、价格信息验证。
(国际PNR中需要存在BPNR，不然会在返回结果的Waring节点中反应)
data.functions:
单PNR信息（旅客+航段）验证
多PNR信息（旅客+航段）验证
单PNR价格验证
多PNR价格验证
多PNR信息（旅客+航段）、多PNR价格验证
单PNR价格验证（带大客户编码）
data.requestSchema: [{"name":"TES_AirResValidateRQ","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"国际可支付校验请求信息","children":[{"name":"POS","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Point Of Sale","children":[{"name":"Source","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"请求者信息","children":[{"name":"RequestorID","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"@ID","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"预定标识号：PNR号","children":[]},{"name":"@IDContext","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"ID内容：类型：IATA_Number","children":[]},{"name":"@IDType","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"请求类型：OTA定义的ID类型属性，13对应IATA_Number","children":[]}]},{"name":"@PseudoCityCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"PCC：代理人office号，如BJS191","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"BookingReferenceID","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"PNR信息","children":[{"name":"@ID","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"预定标识号","children":[]},{"name":"@ID_Context","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"类型：PNR","children":[]}]},{"name":"ValidateInfo","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"校验信息：校验信息","children":[{"name":"PriceRequest","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"运价计算请求信息","children":[{"name":"PriceTravelerInfo","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"旅客信息","children":[{"name":"@PriceTravelerType","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"旅客类型：旅客类型：成人ADT,儿童CNN,婴儿INF","children":[]},{"name":"@Quantity","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"旅客数量：旅客数量","children":[]},{"name":"@AddSegRPH","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[]}]},{"name":"NegotiatedFare","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"@NegotiatedFareCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"大客户编码","children":[]}]},{"name":"AdditionalPriceRQData","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"FareTypeInfo","type":"object","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"Industry fare type or 4 character SITA Global Fare Type","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Fare Type","children":[]},{"name":"@CodeContext","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Specify context of the given code","children":[]}]},{"name":"AdditionalSegmentInfos","type":"object","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"航段信息集合","children":[{"name":"AdditionalSegmentInfo","type":"object","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"航段信息","children":[{"name":"@SegmentRPH","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"References an origin destination flight segment","children":[]},{"name":"@RuleTariff","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"References an origin destination flight segment","children":[]},{"name":"@RuleNumber","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"References an origin destination flight segment","children":[]},{"name":"@FareReference","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Used for forcing pricing to use the specified fare(s). If the complete itinerary is to be priced\n\t\t\t\t\twith a single specified fare then do not use this element, instead use the fare reference element at the request\n\t\t\t\t\tlevel. Use this element to force pricing to use multiple fares.","children":[]}]},{"name":"@RPH","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"与AddSegRPH关联：与PriceTravelerInfo下AddSegRPH关联；","children":[]}]},{"name":"@TicketingFeeInd","type":"boolean","quantity":"1","default":"false","description":"是否OB费","children":[]},{"name":"@TicketingCarrier","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"出票航司代码：主控航司,B系统必传","children":[]},{"name":"@FareCurrencySelection","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"This will enable the user to select fares of a currency other than the default currency of the origin country. It cannot be combined with the CurrencyOverride@Indicator attribute","children":[]}]},{"name":"@NegotiatedFaresOnly","type":"boolean","quantity":"1","default":"false","description":"是否包含大客户运价","children":[]},{"name":"@CurrencyCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"货币代码","children":[]}]},{"name":"AirReservation","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"BookingReferenceID","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"预定信息","children":[{"name":"@ID","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"预定标识号","children":[]},{"name":"@ID_Context","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"预定标识号上下文，PNR或ORDER","children":[]}]},{"name":"AirItinerary","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"行程信息","children":[{"name":"FlightSegment","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"航段信息","children":[{"name":"DepartureAirport","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"出发机场信息","children":[{"name":"@LocationCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"机场代码：机场代码（例如：SHA）","children":[]}]},{"name":"ArrivalAirport","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"到达机场信息","children":[{"name":"@LocationCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"机场代码（例如：SHA）","children":[]}]},{"name":"MarketingAirline","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"市场方航空公司信息","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航空公司代码二字码+航班号：航空公司二字码+航班号（例如：CA669）","children":[]}]},{"name":"OperatingAirline","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"承运方航空公司信息","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航空公司代码（例如：CA）","children":[]}]},{"name":"BookingClassAvail","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"可用舱位信息","children":[{"name":"SubClass","type":"string","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"","children":[]},{"name":"@ResBookDesigCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"舱位代码：舱位代码（例如：K）","children":[]}]},{"name":"@DepartureDateTime","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"出发日期和时间：出发日期和时间（类型：dateTime","children":[]},{"name":"@FlightNumber","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航班号：市场方航班号（例如：1831）","children":[]},{"name":"@SegmentStatus","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航段状态：航段行动代码（例如：NN）","children":[]},{"name":"@SegmentType","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航段类型：航段类型（目前只支持NORMAL类型）","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"TravelerInfo","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"旅客信息","children":[{"name":"AirTraveler","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"乘客信息","children":[{"name":"PersonName","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"姓名信息","children":[{"name":"Surname","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[]}]},{"name":"Document","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"证件信息","children":[{"name":"@DocType","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"证件类型：PP:护照 NI：中国公民身份证 ID：军官证、士兵证等其它可识别证件号； UU：无法识别证件","children":[]},{"name":"@DocID","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"证件号","children":[]}]},{"name":"@PassengerTypeCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"旅客类型","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"PriceInfo","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"待校验运价信息","children":[{"name":"PTC_FareBreakdown","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"TicketingFees","type":"object","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"OB费","children":[{"name":"TicketingFee","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"OB费","children":[{"name":"@Amount","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"数额：总税费","children":[]},{"name":"@CurrencyCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"货币代码：如：CNY","children":[]}]}]}]},{"name":"FareBasisCode","type":"string","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"运价基础信息","children":[]},{"name":"PassengerFare","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"运价详细信息","children":[{"name":"BaseFare","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"总价信息（不包含税费等）","children":[{"name":"@CurrencyCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"货币代码","children":[]},{"name":"@Amount","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"数额","children":[]}]},{"name":"Tax","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"税信息","children":[{"name":"@TaxCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"税代码","children":[]},{"name":"@Amount","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"数额","children":[]},{"name":"@CurrencyCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"货币代码","children":[]}]},{"name":"@PassengerFareType","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"旅客运价类型","children":[]}]},{"name":"Commission","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"代理费率","children":[{"name":"@Percent","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[]}]}]}]}]},{"name":"@MinGroupFareInd","type":"boolean","quantity":"1","default":"false","description":"小团价：是否使用小团价","children":[]},{"name":"@SysType","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"C","description":"系统类型：系统类型: 默认值C(CRS)， 可选值B(ICS)","children":[]}]}]

qaApiDemos.demoDesc: 单PNR信息（旅客+航段）和多Price(运价)校验@Single PNR info(passenger+segment)and multiple Price(transporting fee) check.xml
qaApiDemos.request:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<TES_AirResValidateRQ>
	<POS>
		<Source PseudoCityCode="BJS187">
            <RequestorID ID="08300714"></RequestorID>
		</Source>
	</POS>
	<BookingReferenceID ID="1409231452011fc8d7x" />
	<ValidateInfo>
	     <PriceRequest>
            <PriceTravelerInfo PriceTravelerType="ADT"  Quantity="1" />
            <PriceTravelerInfo PriceTravelerType="CHD"  Quantity="1" />
            <AdditionalPriceRQData TicketingCarrier="MU" />
        </PriceRequest>
		<AirReservation>
			<BookingReferenceID ID="JP7RTQ" />
			<AirItinerary>
				<FlightSegment SegmentStatus="HK" FlightNumber="5145"
					DepartureDateTime="2014-10-16T08:30:00" SegmentType="NORMAL">
					<DepartureAirport LocationCode="SHA" />
					<ArrivalAirport LocationCode="PEK" />
					<MarketingAirline Code="MU" />
					<BookingClassAvail ResBookDesigCode="Y">
					</BookingClassAvail>
				</FlightSegment>
			</AirItinerary>
			<TravelerInfo>
